Dictionary.description: -- Definition -- A code list for the Natura2000 designation scheme.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is designated as a Special Area of Conservation (SAC) under Natura2000.
Definition.name: specialAreaOfConservation

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is designated as a Special Protection Area (SPA) under Natura2000.
Definition.name: specialProtectionArea

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is designated as a Site of Community Interest (SCI) under Natura2000.
Definition.name: siteOfCommunityImportance

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is proposed as a Site of Community Interest (SCI) under Natura2000.
Definition.name: proposedSiteOfCommunityImportance

Definition.description: -- Definition -- The Protected Site is proposed as a Special Protection Area (SPA) under Natura2000.
Definition.name: proposedSpecialProtectionArea
